sentences.en: I am a disappointed drudge, sir.
sentences.cn: 我是个绝望了的苦力, 先生.

sentences.en: I feel like a real drudge — I've done nothing but clean all day!
sentences.cn: 我觉得自己像个做苦工的——整天都在做清洁工作!

sentences.en: I would be content to drudge in earth , easing my heart's disgrace.
sentences.cn: 我情愿去地里干苦力, 来淡化我内心的耻辱.

sentences.en: I wouldn't wish to have my son drudge all his life.
sentences.cn: 我可不愿让我儿子终身做苦工.

sentences.en: If I've gone from stud to spud, then you've gone from doll to drudge.
sentences.cn: 如果说我从猛男变成了懒蛋, 那你就是从美女变成了苦工.
字典编撰者整天忙忙碌碌.

sentences.en: Money can only be the useful drudge of things immeasurably higher than itself.
sentences.cn: 钱只是一种能创造出比它本身价值大得多的劳动工具.

sentences.en: One who does menial work ; a drudge.
sentences.cn: 她做起事来几乎都是 四平八稳.

trans.tran_en: someone who does hard boring work
